summary: Weaponizer is a project adding hundred of weapons that could/should be in Skyrim, but they were not added properly, so it is this project goal to slowly completing and adding them. During the project we gonna add, ballance and fix many weapons of Skyrim specialy weapons made by other modders that gave me persmission to do so. This project is a long
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.ketaros.com/skyrim/banner.png[/img][/center]
[color=yellow][b]-- WHAT IS THIS MOD? --[/b][/color]
At this version (3.2) this mod:
- Adds 102 new weapons to Skyrim totaly immersed/seamless to the world.
- Small Tweak: Vendors/Shops with 3x more money.
- Small Tweak: Arrows stay attached 30 seconds and max limit of arrows attached raised to 12.

Weaponizer is a project that aims to add hundred of weapons that could/should be in Skyrim, but they were not added, so it is this project goal to slowly completing and adding them while ballance and fix weapons.
[color=red]Attention: DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED.[/color]

[color=yellow]Version 3.2:[/color]
- Added 3 new regular Mauls
- Added 5 new regular Combat Hammers
- Added 9 new regular Spears
- Added 6 new regular Long Swords
- Added 1 dropable dagger, the Draugr Dagger
- Added 4 Special Dragon Daggers dropped by dragons
- Fixed the hability to Upgrade all regular weapons
- Fixed the drop rate of Ebony Hex Mace.
- Fixed the drop rate of Elven Double Axe.

[color=yellow]Version 3.0:[/color]
- Added 7 new regular Dual Battleaxes
- Added 4 new regular CLubs
- Added the Ultimate Mara special sword
- Fixed bug related with shortswords
- Fixed texture of Daedric Bastard Sword
- Improoved/Balanced Distribution of New Weapons thru world containers

[color=yellow][b]-- WHERE TO FIND? --[/b][/color]
This is what makes this mod so special.... I have done a DEEP research on how all items in the game appear, so to say specialy understanding the dependencies and linking of the level lists. And thats a very important thing for this project, all weapons Im adding I will try to make them show in the world seamless as possible, and also its crafting, equiping on npcs, loots on chests, etc...
Testing this first version you will already realize a seamless integration of those new arrows, please comment what u think.

[color=yellow][b]-- COMPATIBILITY --[/b][/color]
This mod is compatible with any mod that doesnt deals with Level Lists and regular NPCs weapons, if you have other mods that change Level Lists you will need to use Wyre Bah (google it) to make them work togheter... Without, load Weaponizer last.

[color=yellow][b]-- WHAT ABOUT THE 3D MODELS? --[/b][/color]
Cause Im not a 3D modeler, I do have my programming, texturing and editing skills, but I dont have much skills on 3d, thats why I setting out weaponizer based on retexturing and/or other amazing artists works. Check next session, CREDITS.

[color=yellow][b]-- CREDITS --[/b][/color]
backstept - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17250]Regent Armory[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Models used on Guards Swords).

(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Imperial Gladius.)

(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Dwarven Halberd.)

Lrsamways - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19611]Extended Vanilla Weapons[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Models used to create many weapons, like: Hex Maces, Composite Axes, Dual Battleaxes, Halberds and couple others..)

atomec - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21617]Ceymallari[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Thalmor Royal Sword.)

siberok92 - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20640]Hess Blade[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Legates Swords.)

gechbal - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3054798]The Sword Of The One Eyed Crow Updated[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Ultimate Akatosh sword.)

Sushiyant - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5175]Hot Blood[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Ultimate Mara sword.)

faxivcm - And his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6494]Dagger Craft Package[/url]
(On Weaponizer: Model used to create the Dragon Daggers.)
